title: Nina Hoss
summary:
Nina Hoss (German: [ˈniːna hɔs] (listen); born 7 July 1975) is a German stage and film actress. She is known for her roles in  Christian Petzold's 2014 film Phoenix, for which she won the Toronto Film Critics Association Awards, Mons International Festival of Love Films for best actress and 2014 drama-thriller Yella, for which she won Best Actress - National at Bambi Awards. In addition, she also performed roles in The White Masai (2006) and The Audition (2019), and Pelican Blood (2020). 
Hoss received the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany (2013) and was also appointed a Chevalier de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres in France (2015).
